body:
#### PR description:
To speed-up FullSim for 2-3% two new options available with Geant4 11.1 are enabled:

1) Enable combined process of transportation with multiple scattering. This combined process speed-up Run3 FullSim for ~2%, for Phase-2 for ~8%.

2) Enable cut on photoelectric process below K-shell. This speed-up simulation for ~1%.

Simulation histories will be changed, so we do not expect regression.
